channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 03/09/2024 INC#0367

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0367; 10:00AM; 1400 E Newton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4a5Xb7X; #Downtown; As the formal investigation continues into the specific cause of the fire, it has been determined this was a non-permitted cannabis operation. A pair of cadaver detection canine teams will soon arrive to address unconfirmed reports that one or more persons *may* have been within the now heavily damaged building at the time of the fire. With *one additional* firefighter having experienced an unexpected burning sensation to their face early in the fire attack, there are now a total of *five* firefighters in fair condition, being medically evaluated at an area hospital. No other civilian or firefighter injuries have been reported. No escalating or off-site hazards have been identified.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E2 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E248 E295 E3 E450 E46 E48 E9 EA2 EM1 EM11 EM13 HE1 HR3 JT1 K902 K904 PH1 PI3 PI4 RA10 RA14 RA17 RA209 RA3 RA803 RA809 RA811 SO1 SQ21 SQ48 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T21 T3 T48 T9 T95 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire 03/09/2024 INC#0367

item.description: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0367; 08:56AM; 1400 E Newton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4a5Xb7X; #Downtown; *Address Corrected* 145 LAFD Firefighters took just 56 minutes in largely defensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a 9,100 square foot two-story building in the Central Industrial District of downtown Los Angeles. The 69-year-old brick structure, heavily damaged by the intense fire, appears to have housed a cannabis operation (whether this was a legally permitted business, has yet to be determined). During their initial attack on the flames, four of the first arriving firefighters experienced an unexpected burning sensation to their faces. Pursuant to protocol, the four firefighters, in fair condition and without other medical complaints, have been taken to an area hospital for a comprehensive medical examination. No other injuries were reported, and no escalating or off-site hazards have been identified. With witness reports that one or more persons *may* have been within the structure when the fire erupted, a pair of cadaver detection canine teams have been requested. LAFD Public Information Officer Firefighter David Ortiz is at scene to assist the media. The cause of the fire remains under active investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; E14 T9 E9 E209 RA209 RA809 E210 T10 SQ21 BC1 BC11 RA10 EM1 SO1 E221 T21 E10 E11 E203 T3 CM22 E215 T15 T95 E295 SQ95 EM11 BC13 E3 UR3 HR3 RA3 RA803 UR88 BC5 CM20 E21 BC18 T11 E211 E2 T2 E202 E46 AR1 RA811 EM13 T20 E220 E450 EA2 JT1 PH1 E48 T48 E248 SQ48 PI3 HE1 RA14 RA17 PI4 K902 K904; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0367; 08:00AM; 1405 E Newton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3T87cec; #Downtown; PRELIM: Two story commercial building with fire through the roof.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E203 E209 E210 E215 E221 E295 E3 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA209 RA3 RA803 RA809 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T15 T21 T3 T9 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12, 13; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0658; 11:22AM; 7720 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PdJcoB; #SunValley; Firefighters arrived to find a single-story house with heavy fire showing, and reports of people trapped inside. Crews quickly made access, advanced hose lines, and performed a search of the burning home. Firefighters rescued two people who were trapped inside. One adult male was transported in critical condition and one adult female, thankfully, only had minor injuries. Firefighters also rescued three pets from the house fire. Two canines are doing well, but one feline is in critical condition. Crews are attempting to provide life supporting measures, while Animal Services responds. Ultimately, it took 41 firefighters 21 minutes to access, confine and extinguish the flames, including rescuing the human and animal occupants of the home. No firefighter injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 AR21 AR39 BC10 BC14 E102 E239 E278 E289 E81 E88 E89 EM14 RA102 RA81 RA89 SO1 T39 T78 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0658; 11:01AM; 7720 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PdJcoB; #SunValley; PRELIM: One-story single-family home with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are making access with hose lines for fire attack and a simultaneous search to ensure no one is inside the burning building. Offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 E102 E239 E289 E81 E89 EM14 RA102 RA81 RA89 T39 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0038; 12:57AM; 7400 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48KPYsQ; #VanNuys; It took 70 firefighters 25 minutes operating in defensive mode to extinguish heavy fire consuming a one-story commercial building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E239 E273 E275 E287 E289 E290 E39 E73 E81 E87 E89 E90 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA889 SQ87 T39 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH8; 12 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Technical Rescue; INC#0231; 07:35AM; 1521 S Hill St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uYwLWP; #DowntownLA; Firefighters located a man behind a brick wall inside of a commercial building. The man was awake and talking to them, but trapped and unable to free himself. Firefighters breached the wall with sledgehammers and other tools to free the man. Paramedics evaluated him, found him to be in good condition, and he was released into LAPD custody (LAPD INC#0658). Nothing further. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E203 E210 E227 E3 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA27 RA803 RA827 T10 T27 T3 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Technical Rescue; INC#0231; 06:13AM; 1521 S Hill St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uYwLWP; #Downtown; Firefighters are on scene of a commercial building, where a man is trapped inside of the building’s ducting system. Crews are beginning to breach a wall to make access and rescue the man.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E203 E210 E227 E3 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA27 RA803 RA827 T10 T27 T3 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Sinking Boat; INC#1512; 08:40PM; 1001 S Seaside Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SWDzfG; #SanPedro; Firefighters from LAFD Boats used pumps to eject water from the vessel and successfully keep it afloat. Crews towed the vessel to dock, where they can safely address the problem with the vessel. No reported injuries. Nothing further.; FS 111; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E238 E36 E40 T38; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange
